string-array.name: wait_messages
string-array.item: Hmm. Looks like you are\na bit too late!
Play along next game!\nYou will be notified!
Unlucky in the game,\nlucky in love...
We know you want to play!\nJoin again next game!
A new item will be\ndropped every 0.5 - 2 hours!
Better go for a walk and\nscout for items you expect!
Game has already started :(\nStay tuned though!
Keep up your ranking\nby Snapping quicker then\n others!
Did you know your ranking is\ndetermined by your last\nscores?
Be quick, be agile, \nbe (snap)that warrior.

string-array.name: wait_messages_found
string-array.item: Thank you for playing! \n A new thing will soon drop!
Play along next game!\nThank you for this one!
It\'s over for now... \nBut a new thing will drop soon!
Well played! Join us\nwhen a new one drops!
A new item will be\ndropped every 0.5 - 2 hours!
You did it! You will\nbe notified when a new thing drops!
This game is over. A new thing\nwill arrive in 30-120 minutes!

Thank you for playing!
Keep up your ranking
by Snapping quicker then
 others!

Thanx for playin'!
Did you know your ranking is
determined by your last
scores?
This was a nice one!\nOn to the next one!
